Because the purple rubber sphere moved spontaneously.
Because the purple metal cylinder moved toward the purple rubber sphere.

Because the green rubber sphere was present.

Was the fact that the blue metal sphere moved toward the purple rubber sphere necessary for the purple rubber sphere to move?

options: The green rubber sphere is present.
The blue metal sphere moves toward the purple rubber sphere.
The purple metal cylinder moves toward the purple rubber sphere.
The purple metal cylinder and the blue metal sphere move toward the purple rubber sphere.
